custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM pml_edm_documentreceipt WHERE (datearrive >= ?) AND (datearrive <= ?) AND (lower(documentreference) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(briefcontent) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT pml_edm_documentreceipt.* FROM pml_edm_documentreceipt WHERE (datearrive >= ?) AND (datearrive <= ?) AND (lower(documentreference) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(briefcontent) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
